oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Nathaniel Baxter, Sr. and his sons
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of Nathaniel Baxter, Sr. (1812-1895), who is seated to the left, with three of his sons: Nathaniel Baxter, Jr., Edmund Baxter, and Jere Baxter.

Nathaniel Baxter, Sr. (1812-1895) was a lawyer and Tennessee circuit court judge. He was sympathetic to the Union but his four sons fought for the Confederacy in the Civil War. Photograph was loaned to the Tennessee State Library and Archives by a direct descendant of Nathaniel Baxter, Sr.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Baxter, Jere, 1852-1904; Baxter, Nathaniel, 1844-1913; Baxter, Edmund Dillahunty, 1838-1910
